testsuite.class: PIPE-5949 - Tests for CreateReleaseBundle step - signed pipelines failOnVaidate flag.

testcase.class: CREATERELEASEBUNDLE_STEP - CreateReleaseBundle Step Tests PIPE-5949 - Tests for CreateReleaseBundle step - signed pipelines failOnVaidate flag. S_LX_CreateReleaseBundle_5949_0001. User can add a CreateReleaseBundle step without specifying failOnValidate and it defaults to false. The step attempts to create a release bundle with an input build info that has an invalid artifact signature. The create release bundle is successful.
testcase.classclass: S_LX_CreateReleaseBundle_5949_0001. User can add a CreateReleaseBundle step without specifying failOnValidate and it defaults to false. The step attempts to create a release bundle with an input build info that has an invalid artifact signature. The create release bundle is successful.

testcase.class: CREATERELEASEBUNDLE_STEP - CreateReleaseBundle Step Tests PIPE-5949 - Tests for CreateReleaseBundle step - signed pipelines failOnVaidate flag. S_LX_CreateReleaseBundle_5949_0002. User can add a CreateReleaseBundle step specifying failOnValidate as true. The step attempts to create a release bundle with an input build info with an invalid artifact signature. The create release bundle fails.
testcase.classclass: S_LX_CreateReleaseBundle_5949_0002. User can add a CreateReleaseBundle step specifying failOnValidate as true. The step attempts to create a release bundle with an input build info with an invalid artifact signature. The create release bundle fails.

testcase.class: CREATERELEASEBUNDLE_STEP - CreateReleaseBundle Step Tests PIPE-5949 - Tests for CreateReleaseBundle step - signed pipelines failOnVaidate flag. S_LX_CreateReleaseBundle_5949_0003. User can add a CreateReleaseBundle step specifying failOnValidate as true. The step attempts to create a release bundle with multiple input build infos with one of them that has an invalid artifact signature. The create release bundle fails.
testcase.classclass: S_LX_CreateReleaseBundle_5949_0003. User can add a CreateReleaseBundle step specifying failOnValidate as true. The step attempts to create a release bundle with multiple input build infos with one of them that has an invalid artifact signature. The create release bundle fails.

testcase.class: CREATERELEASEBUNDLE_STEP - CreateReleaseBundle Step Tests PIPE-5949 - Tests for CreateReleaseBundle step - signed pipelines failOnVaidate flag. S_LX_CreateReleaseBundle_5949_0004. User can add a CreateReleaseBundle step specifying failOnValidate as true. The step attempts to create a release bundle with an input build info that has a valid artifact signature. The create release bundle is successful.
testcase.classclass: S_LX_CreateReleaseBundle_5949_0004. User can add a CreateReleaseBundle step specifying failOnValidate as true. The step attempts to create a release bundle with an input build info that has a valid artifact signature. The create release bundle is successful.

testcase.class: CREATERELEASEBUNDLE_STEP - CreateReleaseBundle Step Tests PIPE-5949 - Tests for CreateReleaseBundle step - signed pipelines failOnVaidate flag. S_LX_CreateReleaseBundle_5949_0005. User can add a CreateReleaseBundle step specifying failOnValidate as false. The step attempts to create a release bundle with an input build info that has a valid artifact signature. The create release bundle is successful.
testcase.classclass: S_LX_CreateReleaseBundle_5949_0005. User can add a CreateReleaseBundle step specifying failOnValidate as false. The step attempts to create a release bundle with an input build info that has a valid artifact signature. The create release bundle is successful.
